<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ganjay Book](/Equipment.aspx?ID=859)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 96</row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L or —
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This item is a [formula book](/Equipment.aspx?ID=22), [religious text](/Equipment.aspx?ID=42), or [spellbook](/Equipment.aspx?ID=53) that has been creased—possibly by Princess Ganjay herself—to fold up into an impossibly small shape. When folded up, the book can't be read or used, but its Bulk is reduced by 1 (a book that is 1 Bulk becomes light Bulk, and a book that is light Bulk becomes negligible in weight).

<document level="2" id="action-641" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ganjay Book
